name: Critter Crops (itch)
description:
[Please note, Critter Crops is in the beginning stages of development by a solo developer! Please be patient! Also, please consider joining the discord!]

You've received a letter saying you've been given ownership of a mansion on a faraway island after being run out of your home town for being a witch. Upon arrival, you find that the town is empty and you cant shake this feel like something is amiss. A bag of items is left for you with farming gear and a key which thankfully opens the doors to the inn since the mansion doors shut tight. After being cast from society for your magic, this is your chance to make a home all your own...or is it? Something here is rather....odd?

Features

Turn a dead and deserted field into life!Grow crops which make amazing transformations into the Critters that will aide you on your journey to revive Mur Mur Town. 

Fix it up! Work hard to gain the funds to bring Mur Mur Town back to its former glory. Who knows, maybe one day other people will move there!

Uncover the mystery of your secret Pen Pal! Study the mysterious letters and complete their tasks to get close to the truth about who your mysterious benefactor is.

Be the change! The old mansion seems to be locked up tight. Do everything you can to restore it and bring it back to life...no matter how hard it stares with disapproval.
